_description: Death’s inevitability — one quatrain translating ‘Si prece vel precio potuisset Mors superare…’ which precedes it in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
ȝef preyȝer or medemith of detȝ maken
                    meistreÞoru preyȝere or medeman of detȝ sulde be
                    fre
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 24.
